column1: Art Institute of Chicago////That being said
column2: paying admission to the Art Institute is so worth the money (plus
column4: you can usually get some sort of deal...when I was there last
column5: it was two for one for all Bank of America customers).  I could spend days in this place...there is so much to see!  Last time I was there
column6: I was lucky enough to see the Chagall America Windows which are truly beautiful and a must-see for all art lovers.
